DOC.brief_title: An Open-Label Safety Study Of DIC075V ( Intravenous Diclofenac Sodium ) In Patients With Acute Post-Operative Pain
DOC.detailed_description: This open-label , multiple-dose , multiple-day , single-arm safety study repeat-doses DIC075V patient acute post-operative pain follow abdominal ( i.e. , non-laparoscopic abdominal surgery ) orthopedic ( e.g. , hip knee joint replacement ) surgery . Eligible patient receive DIC075V IV bolus q6 hour . Safety assessment collect baseline ( immediately prior start DIC075V therapy ) study discharge early termination .
